channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs are headed for a constitutional showdown at the Supreme Court that could reshape presidential power for decades
item.description: The Trump administration appealed a ruling by a federal trade court invalidating many of the president’s recent tariffs.

item.title: Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50%, touts U.S. Steel-Nippon deal
A pivotal OPEC+ decision this weekend could tank crude-oil prices by 10%
There are 500,000 more people selling their homes in the U.S. than those looking to buy them
item.description: Still, the median home price jumped 1.6% YoY last month and is sitting at $431,931.

item.title: Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50%
item.description: Trump said U.S. Steel will stay an American company under a deal for Japan-based Nippon to invest in the iconic American steelmaker.

item.title: Stocks flat after Trump says China ‘totally violated’ trade agreement with U.S.
item.description: The U.S. and China had previously agreed to a 90-day pause in which both countries would ratchet down reciprocal tariffs.

item.title: Elon Musk just had his last day with DOGE, which he says became a ‘scapegoat’ for government cuts
item.description: President Trump honored the Tesla CEO with a farewell press conference in the Oval Office on Friday.

item.title: U.S. stocks end mixed, claw back earlier losses as S&P seals best May since 1990
‘You're going to panic’: Dimon warns regulators of bond market's coming cracks
As S&P 500 scores best May in 35 years, tariff worries dim outlook for stocks
